bullets: Delivered a visual editor for Yext Pages with a team of seven developers using Gerrit for code reviews and Jira for stories.
Accelerated site initialization time by 95% through a gRPC endpoint in Go to automate repo provisioning and deployment.
Architected a HTTP router for a new Go microservice, supporting 30+ routes and the migration of 75+ routes via gRPC.
Refactored React components and Java RPC endpoints to allow data filtering, updating 63 usages in a distributed system.
Mentored 15 students in building full-stack applications with Django, AWS S3, GitHub Actions, and RESTful APIs.
Facilitated sprint planning and refinement workshops, enabling student teams to adopt and excel in agile environments.
Guided 400+ students in weekly office hours on topics such as object-oriented programming and Java testing frameworks.
Delivered instruction on core topics like TDD, REST, JUnit, Mockito, Selenium, CI/CD, and Git workflows.
Drove initial sales and secured a $30k grant by leading development on critical new features to aggregate insurance data.
Boosted frontend responsiveness by 61% (from 5.4s to 2.1s) by optimizing MySQL queries for pagination and filtering.
Enhanced scalability and maintainability by refactoring 60,000+ lines of JavaScript into AWS Lambda serverless functions.
Refined data quality for a National Science Foundation project by developing Python scripts to clean and format data.
Facilitated linear regression analysis by aggregating COVID-19 mobility data from 1.8 million U.S. locations.

Led a presentation to over 120 faculty and interns at the UVA Biocomplexity Institute's annual research symposium by collaborating with a mentor to research and create a final poster of all research findings.
